title: David Lynch--Wandering Home
description:
A live Recording of Sax/flute/percussion player and composer David Lynch at the 

Athens Concert Hall on 1998-10-05.


 
The musicians:

Stavros Lantsias - Piano and Keybords

Satnam Ramgotra - Drums and percussion

Davy Spillane - Uilleann pipes

Haig Yazdjian - Oud/vocals

Yiotis Kiourtsoglou - Electric Bass

Lior Yekutieli - Guitar

Martin Tillman - Cello

David Lynch - Saxophones/percussion/vocals
 


Words from the artist:

I consider myself fortunate that this music chose me as its voice.

Instruments that I had never heard together were to join, forming a warm emotional layering of sound and soul.

We all originate from the same source and share the same simple truths; the pipes and cello both mourn, oud and sax psalm, bass and tabla dance, piano and guitar reminisce and voices cry out. All are present in all. All are one.

For us...it was just a matter of Wandering Home.



Tracks

1. Over the Years
2. A Place in the Wind
3. The Bridge Between
4. Wandering Home
5. Looking Out
6. Ballad for What Was
7. To Taxidi Tou Paravati (part 1)
8. To Taxidi Tou Paravati (part 2)
9. The End of the Day
10.Awaiting the Dawn
